Class MenuItem

java.lang.Object
cz2002.MenuItem
All Implemented Interfaces:
Printable
Direct Known Subclasses:
AlaCarteItem, SetPackage
public abstract class MenuItem extends Object implements Printable
Class containing common functionalities and attributes of all items in the menu.
